title: Spacious top floor unit close to 101, restaurants and shops.
posting_body: :-(  Please copy-and-paste this link into the address bar on your web browser.
Spacious top floor unit close to 101, restaurants and shops.
647 Grand Ave - 4, South San Francisco, CA, 94080
•	Large living area with floor to ceiling windows
•	Breakfast bar right off galley kitchen
•	extra storage closet right outside on bedroom
•	Gated building with shared court yard
•	1 car garage on the backside of the building
Owner pays water, sewer and garbage.
Security deposit is $2300 with one-year lease.
Pets may be considered with reference and additional security deposit.

Applications and instructions can be downloaded at <URL>; $40 application fee per adult payable in cash, cashier's check, money order or via Paypal to Bay Area Property Management; proof of verifiable income required with completed application forms.
